title: Relates to preauthorized electronic fund transfers
summary: Provides that no agreement for preauthorized electronic fund transfers entered into on or after January first, two thousand twelve permit or require the transfer of any amount as a penalty or final payment after a stop payment notice has been given.

    4  institution  which provides preauthorized electronic fund transfers from

   12  this section.] For purposes of this section, "banking institution" shall
   13  mean any state or federally chartered bank, trust company, savings bank,

   15  shall  mean  an account used primarily for personal, family or household
   16  purposes.
